messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Asss Captain of thisss ssstation it isss imperative that I disssclossse thisss information.  I am the ssson of god and thisss ssstation isss now officially ordained by the church.  I will receive your prayersss, not your quessstionsss.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of [REDACTED] have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Imperium Friendship Base Omicron have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Imperium Friendship Base Omicron. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Imperium Friendship Base Omicron door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Imperium Friendship Base Omicron. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
